verses.text: \w Then|strong="H2009"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w looked|strong="H7200"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H5375"\w* \w with|strong="H5869"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* measuring line \w in|strong="H7200"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* hand.

\w I|strong="H4100"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w*, “\w Where|strong="H4100"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w you|strong="H4100"\w* going?” \w He|strong="H3389"\w* \w replied|strong="H1696"\w*, “\w To|strong="H1696"\w* measure \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w to|strong="H1696"\w* see \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w its|strong="H7161"\w* breadth \w and|strong="H3063"\w* length.”

\w Then|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* messenger \w who|strong="H3068"\w* talked \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w* stepped forward, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w another|strong="H7200"\w* messenger \w went|strong="H3068"\w* \w out|strong="H7200"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w meet|strong="H7200"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w*,

\w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w said|strong="H6310"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w him|strong="H6213"\w*, “Run \w and|strong="H3063"\w* tell \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H1471"\w* young \w man|strong="H5375"\w* \w that|strong="H1471"\w* Jerusalem \w will|strong="H1471"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* inhabited \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* village \w without|strong="H3808"\w* walls, because \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w many|strong="H4100"\w* \w people|strong="H1471"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* cattle \w will|strong="H1471"\w* live there.

\w For|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w*, says \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \nd Lord\nd*, \w will|strong="H5869"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* wall \w of|strong="H3027"\w* fire \w around|strong="H3027"\w* \w her|strong="H5375"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* glory \w in|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* midst \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w her|strong="H5375"\w*.

\w Up|strong="H7200"\w*! \w Away|strong="H1980"\w*! Flee \w from|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* land \w of|strong="H7341"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* north, says \w the|strong="H7200"\w* 
d Lord
d*. \w For|strong="H3389"\w* \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w have|strong="H7200"\w* \w spread|strong="H1980"\w* \w you|strong="H4100"\w* \w abroad|strong="H1980"\w* \w as|strong="H3389"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* four winds \w of|strong="H7341"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* heavens, says \w the|strong="H7200"\w* 
d Lord
d*.
\w Up|strong="H3318"\w*, \w escape|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* Zion, \w you|strong="H1696"\w* \w who|strong="H4397"\w* live \w in|strong="H1696"\w* Babylon.

\w This|strong="H1696"\w* \w is|strong="H3389"\w* \w what|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \nd Lord\nd* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* hosts \w says|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* nations which plundered \w you|strong="H8432"\w*: Whoever touches \w you|strong="H8432"\w* touches \w the|strong="H8432"\w* apple \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w my|strong="H8432"\w* eye.

\w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* raise \w my|strong="H3068"\w* hand \w against|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H5439"\w*. \w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* plunder \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w own|strong="H1961"\w* slaves; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H8432"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* know \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* hosts \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w sent|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w*.

“Sing \w and|strong="H3068"\w* rejoice, daughter \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6566"\w*! \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* coming, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* live among \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w says|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Many nations \w will|strong="H1323"\w* \w join|strong="H3427"\w* themselves \w to|strong="H1323"\w* \w the|strong="H3427"\w* 
d Lord
d* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w that|strong="H4422"\w* day, \w and|strong="H3427"\w* \w will|strong="H1323"\w* \w be|strong="H6726"\w* \w his|strong="H4422"\w* \w people|strong="H3427"\w*, \w and|strong="H3427"\w* \w he|strong="H3427"\w* \w will|strong="H1323"\w* \w live|strong="H3427"\w* \w among|strong="H3427"\w* \w you|strong="H6726"\w*. \w You|strong="H6726"\w* \w will|strong="H1323"\w* know \w that|strong="H4422"\w* \w the|strong="H3427"\w* 
d Lord
d* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* hosts \w has|strong="H6726"\w* sent me \w to|strong="H1323"\w* \w you|strong="H6726"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* inherit Judah \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* portion \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* holy land. \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w again|strong="H7971"\w* choose \w Jerusalem|strong="H3519"\w*.

\w Be|strong="H1961"\w* silent, everyone, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w presence|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w coming|strong="H5650"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* holy dwelling.”
